attributes.action: ASK the P.M to URGE Iran & Russia to stop sending nuclear weapons to Syria.
attributes.additional_details: Delegated by Kutaiba: "My country in hell and out of all that has happened on this earth recently, the whole world wants a rest. We just want to be free from the President, using Vladmir Putin's and Hassain Rouhani's weapons against us. You have the power to fix my war".
attributes.background: The Syrian conflict is between the ruling power of Shia muslims, who, as soon as Sunni Muslims (the rest of the country) wanted a different government, started killing them.Iran and Russia are sending weapons for the minortity group, Shias, who are brutually murdering Syrians, who are forced to flee
